entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
